Overview
YouTube is the biggest learning platform in history. We built this extension because we are passionate about finding ways to reduce how much time it takes to consume and absorb content on YouTube. YouTube QuickPlay is the ultimate Chrome extension for smart video summarisation, helping students, professionals, and lifelong learners maximize their educational content consumption.

How to Use:
1. Install the YouTube QuickPlay Chrome Extension
2. Navigate to any YouTube video
3. Sign in with Google
4. Choose your viewing mode (Video Moments, Chapters, Summary, or Transcript)
5. Navigate content with our intuitive video player controls

The extension is free to try with limited uses. Premium users get unlimited access to all AI-powered video analysis features.

For more information, visit: YoutubeQuickPlay.com
